laboratory_examinations.findings: No residual AR after aortic valve replacement.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Three years later, mild AR noted on echocardiogram; four years postoperatively, moderate AR on echocardiogram.
Increased severity of AR from moderate to moderate-to-severe.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Mild LV hypertrophy without dilatation; SPV valve leaflets appeared normal; No AR; Maximal flow velocity across the SPV was 2.2 m/s, corresponding to a peak transvalvular gradient of approximately 19 mm Hg.
